item.title: Revel: Configuration Management
item.description: Every web application requires configuration management. Providing a configuration manager is one of important tasks of any web framework. Rails does it by asking the user to edit yaml files and a few ruby files. Some node.js frameworks achieve this by using JSON files. In this post, I will present an idea on how the configuration management system should ideally work. Two years ago, during this time Heroku published a website detailing a concept called The Twelve-Factor App.
